import React from 'react' import './Products.css' import { Product } from '../../model/Product' import { useState } from 'react' type Props = { handleOnDelete: (idProduct:string) => void, product: Product; }; const ProductItem:React.FC=({product,handleOnDelete})=> { return (

{product.name}

1500$ {product.price}$
) } export default ProductItem
